title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 115.3 - Modifications increasing Federal itemized deductions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 115.3 - Modifications increasing Federal itemized deductions

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 615(d)
(a) The total amount of itemized deductions
from Federal adjusted gross income should be increased by the amount of the
items specified in section
615 (d)
of the Tax
